text: Ubwo (Zakariya) yari ahagaze asengamu cyumba cy’amasengesho, abamalayika baramuhamagaye baramubwira ati " Allah aguhaye inkuru nziza yo kuzabyara umwana w’umuhungu (uzitwa) Yahaya, uzahamya ijambo riturutse kwa Allah (iremwa rya Yesu), akazaba umunyacyubahiro, utazashaka umugore ndetse akazaba umuhanuzi n’umwe mu ntungane
